This short essay was part of a Computer Science class problem set which involved programming part of a webcrawler and its support programs. The essay discusses possible scalability issues in programming a webcrawler, creating indices, data structures, etc. for the real internet using SML (Standard Meta Language).
Have you ever wanted to find something on the internet? During my travels on the internet, I have followed this basic search procedure to find information on the net.

The following was a presentation given to children about water conservation for my Educate for the Earth environmental group at Cornell. The presentation is accompanied by two figures [ 1 ] [ 2 ] and used the Environmental Protection Agency's website for extensive textual and link information.
How to Succeed in Technical/General Liberal Arts Courses is the title of this list format text.
